metadata.name: Kubernetes Events Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects when events are deleted in Kubernetes. An adversary may delete Kubernetes events in an attempt to evade detection.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM api_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND lower(api.operation) = lower('delete') AND lower(resources.name) = lower('events'))

output.summary: Detects when events are deleted in Kubernetes. An adversary may delete Kubernetes events in an attempt to evade detection.
